title: "Finnish border officials use facial recognition software to nab Russian terrorism suspect"
excerpt: "A Russian citizen travelling under the name Voislav Torden was identified and apprehended by Finnish Border Guard personnel with the help of facial recognition technology. The 36-year-old man has since been detained into custody by a Finnish court on suspicion of committing terrorism offences in Ukraine."
